title: League crashing after champion select. Leave buster punishment 20 minute wait.
body: I'm on mac, never had a problem like this before and I have no way to tell if anything has been fixed. Every time I check to see if its fixed I get a harder punishment after being forced to restart my computer. *Cannot rejoin back* I have tried everything, even the support tips. I'm very concerned for my account. This is no hardware issue, my computer is high end. Whats also weird is that every time I black screen I can still hear music and adjust my brightness. The only way of getting out of it is by restarting the computer. All this started happening after the patch.

replies.body:
It sounds like League may be encountering an issue when requesting access to your graphics driver or video card. There are a number of quick resets that can be done in order to see if this is caused by some system management chipsets. I recommend working through the steps in our [Mac FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac) as a first step to resolving this.

Let me know if that produced any solution.

Uninstall reinstall try repair kit in log in screen. 
Buy $100 computer from Craigslist an never worry about it again?
